title: Efficacy and Safety of the Rivastigmine Transdermal Patch in Patients With Probable Alzheimer's Disease
description_brief: The goal of this research study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of the rivastigmine transdermal patch in patients with probable Alzheimer's Disease.
drug: Rivastigmine (transdermal patch; brand Exelon) — small‑molecule acetylcholinesterase/butyrylcholinesterase inhibitor
explanation_target: Reason: The trial tests rivastigmine delivered via a transdermal patch to patients with probable Alzheimer’s disease.
